snippet: State efforts have curbed some payday loan abuses, but federal regulators should do more
abstract: Editorial calls on federal regulators to do more to curb payday loan abuses, particularly since the federal Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has not yet formulated rules governing such loans; notes while some states have made efforts to tighten regulations on such loans, more than half the states offer little or no protection from unscrupulous payday lenders.
lead_paragraph: State efforts have curbed some payday loan abuses, but federal regulators should do more
